channel.title: cat-MŌ TE NOHOTAPU KI TE KOREKAI on devotional.gq
channel.description: Recent content in cat-MŌ TE NOHOTAPU KI TE KOREKAI on devotional.gq

item.title: Prayer bpn10221 in Māori
item.description: *Kei te Kitáb-i-Aqdas te kōrero: “Ko tā mātou kupu ki a koutou kia tuku inoi, kia korekai mai i te tīmatatanga o te pakeketanga (15 ngā tau); nā Te Atua tēnei kupu, ko tōu Ariki, te Ariki o ō mātua tūpuna … ēngari mō te tangata e hāereere ana, te hunga e māuiui ana, te wahine hapū, whāngote kōhungahunga ana rānei … Kaua e kai, kaua e inu mai i te whitinga mai o te rā ki tōna tōremitanga, kia mataara kei haukotia koe e hiahia mai i te whai tohu kua tuhia ki te Pukapuka.
